catalog.name: d300000 NCAR RDA - NCAR MMM 10-member, 3 km, experimental real-time ensemble prediction system

dataset.name: d300000 NCAR RDA - NCAR MMM 10-member, 3 km, experimental real-time ensemble prediction system

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR RDA - NCAR MMM 10-member, 3 km, experimental real-time ensemble prediction system (d300000)

metadata.documentation: Since April 2015, NCAR's Mesoscale and Microscale Meteorology (MMM) Laboratory, in collaboration with NCAR's Computational Information Systems Laboratory (CISL), has been producing daily, real-time, 10 member, 48 hour ensemble forecasts with 3 km horizontal grid spacing over the conterminous United States (http://ensemble.ucar.edu). Selected post-processed 2D fields and select soundings are available.

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR Ensemble Forecasts Homepage -Access realtime forecast products
